Actions.Name: Chain Bolt
Actions.AreaEffect: One or two different foes in range 4 from the target foe also take 2 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Entrench
Actions.Description: The [name] puts down a siege rune under itself, or in an adjacent space. While standing in a siege rune, the [name] or its allies deal bonus damage, and their attacks shove 1 and inflict vulnerable on their attack target.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Choose one or two free spaces in range.
Actions.TerrainEffect: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 2 piercing damage twice, and ending this effect. Otherwise, it expires if the [name] is defeated.
